website_summaries.verdict: While the HTC U12 Plus is one of the most unusual phones you can buy, it lacks the refinement to truly compete against Samsung, LG and OnePlus.
pros: The HTC U12 Plus lets you customize its squeezable sides to launch any app
It has a fast processor, good cameras and is water-resistant
cons: Its "fake" side buttons are tiring to use
Photos required too much editing to make good
Battery life is mediocre for a battery this size

customer_reviews.title: This phone is TOTALLY worth the expense
customer_reviews.text: Had the phone for a week, and I can safely assure that the U12+ is a killer smartphone, definitely worth the purchase: - "Buttons" are JUST FINE guys! Feels like the overblown reviews on them are just that (or HTC updated them); either way, buttons and HTC Sense work perfectly fine :-) - Software has no lag whatsoever - The build quality, beside beautiful, is TREMENDOUS and tough - I have rocked this (and dropped) without a case, and still no scratches If you can shell out for this phone, do it. No regrets on my end. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Plastic case not shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: The phone ordered through amazon came with the phone, wall port for charger, charging cord, headphones, replaceable ear buds and a cheap plastic case. This is just for those who had concerns on what came in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is beautiful. Super fast. Easy to use. Great camera. And the edge sense is so cool!
customer_reviews.author: Kolby

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I just upgraded to the U12+ from an HTC One M8 and love the phone. I deducted 1 star because I'm still undecided on the whole lack of physical buttons. I've had it less than a week and getting more accustomed to the whole HTC Edge Sense and how it reacts. Once I'm used to Sense and the digital buttons, maybe I'll give it 5 stars. The phone is lightning fast compared to my old phone, charges faster, battery lasts longer, takes fantastic pictures, etc. I've been using HTC phones since the EVO and hope they keep making phones as I'm not a fan of Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: gpburdell

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is simply beautiful, smooth and takes good pictures. Functions well as a phone with good phone calls. The buttons... it's not as bad as what reviewers said, but admittedly I would prefer normal buttons. That being said, it's not a deal breaker in this case. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Seng B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Welcome back HTC. Solid device if you're looking for an upgrade or near future. PRO - The phone design Screen Size Camera SD card supported T-mobile Customer will get Volte and Wifi calling.
customer_reviews.author: TechJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 1 month, then completely shut off. Deamed not fixable. 3 mos later still trying to get MW electronics to make it right. And either refund me or at least replace my phone! (Which will probably never happen) 👿👿👿 Update-so mw electronics finally, 6 mos later, gave me a 50% refund and let me keep the phone. Which I then took the refund and sent the phone to HTC to get repaired and then used the refund to pay the repairs. So except a long wait and a lot of hassle they did sort of make it right. I now have the phone back and it works great....so far
customer_reviews.author: Cody Knipp

customer_reviews.title: did not include listed headphones
customer_reviews.text: didn't come in the factory box, but rather a nondescript android phone box, marked pcs. phone seems in fine shape, but the listed included wireless headphones were not included, just a usb cable.
customer_reviews.author: Brett S Nienburg

customer_reviews.title: BEST Phone of 2018
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone, amazing camera. Don't listen to all the bad reviews that only gave this phone 2 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Valentin-Zeno

customer_reviews.title: Awesome experience buying a used phone
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I bought a used phone and it worked out perfect. There are no issues with the phone. Looks great, awesome battery life and a great upgrade from my HTC 10.
customer_reviews.author: LBrooks

customer_reviews.title: Terrible display can barely see in bright sun
customer_reviews.text: I had pre ordered it from htc which they messed up my order so got it from Amazon which is the best anyway as Amazon delivers fast but once I got it the first day was fine next day my screen would go from a white background to a black grey background like in the messaging app and others I did 2 factory resets and nothing would help it after 3 calls to htc and no help I returned the device a friend of mine with the same issues also terrible job htc
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product have been using it for well over a year
customer_reviews.text: I love this product have been using it for well over a year. hopefully this phone last as long as my HTC m8 did. My m8 lasted over 4 years. would still be using it but could not get a OS that would run current software.
customer_reviews.author: starwolf

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for the a good phone
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t use the fingerprint reader has been a good phone for quite a while
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Mc Knight

customer_reviews.title: Luv it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this phone along with the features!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Herman

customer_reviews.title: I wanted the phone to work
customer_reviews.text: Well, I switched chip from my old phone to this phone and the calls worked great. Unfortunately, the texting part did not work, :-(. I liked the phone and the squeeze function, and the camera is great. The squeeze function was inhibited by the cover I bought, but maybe that more the cover than the phone. If it were not for the texting part, more crucial than calling these days, I would have kept the phone. I returned it because I could not get texts.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Herrera

customer_reviews.title: if you like to be the stand out
customer_reviews.text: OK let's me get these out there these phone is good I like to be the outcast in the crowd the has a different phone from the Samsung and apples lol Don't get me wrong I love the way it looks the 6" LCD display the Snapdragon 845 makes these fast but the only thing I hate is that one of my buttons idk if just my device but the volume down is more sensitive and the volume up I have to put a little more force on it and with a case on some times I get ghost touch and even after the update it kinda stayed the same for my device
customer_reviews.author: Blackflag9

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY DIED IN LESS THAN 2 YEARS, WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: Battery died in less than 2 year from purchase date. My prior HTC U11, did same thing, but died in less that 1 year. Just know that this is more of a did posable phone with life of less than 2 years! Went with Huawei and have been delighted after 3 years of usage!
customer_reviews.author: karenbetz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Upgrade for Users Using the HTC U11 - Commands/procedures very similar/enhanced
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful upgrade from my HTC U11; finest phone I've ever used. The screen, the smaller screen within a screen option (so you can use your thumb to navigate the screen), the enhanced touch squeeze functions, and the speed/response makes this device a lot more fun to use. The sound quality is also 10 to 20 percent better than the HTC U11, which is already pretty good. Highly recommended - ck HTC Website for specs and more.
customer_reviews.author: joeyman9

customer_reviews.title: All i have is love for this phone.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing, i pre-order it from HTC.com and i have it for 3 weeks now, fast, great build quality ,charger crazy fast and only have to charge the phone once a day, and sometimes twice because of playing games. Which runs perfects in the phone. Loving PUBG more than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Angel Santana

product_meta.title: HTC U12+ Factory Unlocked Phone - 6" Screen - 64GB - Translucent Blue (U.S. Warranty)
product_meta.description: One of the highest Rated smartphone cameras ever: dxo Mark of 90: 16 MP front facing camera and 12MP UltraPixel rear-facing camera with optical image stabilization, HDR boost, and Ultra speed autofocus. World's first edge sense squeeze: squeeze the sides of the phone to open and interact with your favorite features; open the camera, take photos, take a screen shot, turn on flashlight, open apps and activate voice assistants. All new (just out of the box) devices will prompt the user to approve the download of the newest update when they turn their device on for the first time. If the user is already using the device, they can access the newest update by going to the System Menu/About Phone/Software Updates/ Check Now. If the newest update is available, it will download and install. Verizon functionality will require a new Verizon sim card and a customer account plan that supports HD Voice/Voice over LTE
feature_bullets: Cutting edge design - incredible 6.0” Quad HD display with 18: 9 Aspect ratio
Edge sense 2 - squeeze the sides of the phone or now you can even double tap or hold to interact with some of your favorite Features
Highest rated Dual front and back cameras - dxo Mark Score of 103: Dual 16 and 12 MP rear-facing cameras and 2 - 8 MP front-facing cameras delivering beautiful bokeh effect images
Best ever audio - HTC Boom Sound hi-fi Edition speaker system paired with the included HTC sonic earbuds with active noise cancellation
Unrivalled power and performance - flagship-level specs in every way including the Qualcomm Snapdragon 845 mobile platform
Verizon functionality will require a new Verizon sim card and a customer account plan that supports HD Voice/Voice over LTE
